author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
title: Analysis: Why Joe Biden picked Ketanji Brown Jackson for the Supreme Court
description: President Joe Biden's decision to nominate Ketanji Brown Jackson to the Supreme Court, as CNN first reported, kills two birds with one stone: It satisfies -- and Biden hopes energizes -- liberals while also giving Senate Democrats a nominee they can confirm w…
